sentence.Network_en: Our educational system were fashioned after its bookless past.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们教育制度效法没有书籍的古代教育.

PerfectNetExp.abs: boneless 无骨的bookless 无书的bootless 无用的
why is education democratic in bookless tribal societies ?为什么在没有书籍的部落社会,教育是民主的?
